dict.acceptation: 罐；一罐；（某种用途的）容器；陶盆；
把…栽入盆中；种盆栽；台球、普尔和斯诺克击（球）入袋；射杀；

sent.orig: Conducting polyaniline (PANI) and poly-O-methylaniline (POT) were prepared by chemical oxidation method.
sent.trans: 用化学氧化法制备导电聚苯胺(PANI)和聚邻甲苯胺(POT)。

sent.orig: When we pot water, the water stops flowing. The still water pot for long time stinks.
sent.trans: 当我们将水装进罐子里，水就不能流动，而不流动的水放久了，它就会失去原有的清澈。

sent.orig: The starting broth for the hot pot is free in this hot pot restaurant.
sent.trans: 这家火锅城的锅底儿是免费的。

sent.orig: Medium the fire goes to open again the pot, add a pot of few parsley.
sent.trans: 中火至再开锅，加少许香菜出锅即可。

sent.orig: Chongqing Pot: pot-is the most famous and favorite dish in Chongqing.
sent.trans: 重庆火锅：火锅-是最有名的和最喜爱的菜肴在重庆。
